resources.string:
Hello, Cryptanalyst.

Let\'s see your information... You\'re Syfer Liste, a top cryptanalyst from England huh... Ever tried to step into a real crime scene?

Anyway, before the crime happened, we intercepted a message from the killer. Perhaps you could check it out? Just go to the electronic database, please NOT confuse it with the paper database. I\'m sure you can find the way.

To access the database, just use your name. No capitals or space needed.

--- C.S.I.B Director, Athello Apona

Welcome to the Electronic Database, Listen. I heard from Apona that you’re going to have to access the Sigil Killer’s message? Well, here ya go! We’ve deciphered pretty much all of it, but we are stuck on the second word. It would be wonderful if you could go to the analysis lab in the first building here and talk to the specialist about it. I think he was Miro Jurisic? Remember, it’s not the room at the last end of the hallway. Anyways, Good luck.

--- C.S.I.B. Computer Forensic Department Director, Aring Tulan
